publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5669.2 Margaret Mitchell: Dealing with Illegal Money Lendersâ€”As an amendment to motion (S2M-5669) in the name of Des McNulty, insert at end "recognises that an increase in the number of police walking our streets would encourage and give people more confidence to report the activities of illegal money lenders in local communities, and believes that tackling personal debt and financial exclusion is an issue of social responsibility." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
